title: XrpClassic
author: XrpClassic
content: Welcome the XRP Classic!Xrp Classic, This is a future for everyone.Xrp Classic's purpose is to develop eco-friendly solutions that will make the cryptocurrency space safer and easier to understand for everyone.Xrp Classic is a project established to create its own ReFi blockchain.Our Vision To Create an Innovative, Longstanding, Multi-Platformed Ecosystem that allows users to earn through an enjoyable and memorable experience.Our Mission is to bring our vision into reality!We dedicate ourselves to working tirelessly through the multiple phases of development all in order to create an Ecosystem that truly feels like Home for our dedicated community of investors.Xrp Classic is a Hyper-Deflationary Token that has a Smart Exchange System built into the ecosystem. Xrp Classic Automatically Sends $XRP Rewards Directly to your Wallet.All holders who is holding at least $50 in $XRPC will automatically receive $XRP rewards.Watch the amount of $XRP grow in your wallet as Xrp Classic holders automatically receive a 6% fee from every on chain transaction that happens on the Xrp Classic Ecosystem.The community receives more $XRP from the fees generated each transaction.Furthermore, it acts as the foundation upon which many of Xrp Classic ongoing community development efforts will build additional features and functionality exclusive to $XRPC holders.We have built a very solid team of experienced experts and entrepreneurs from industries. We will work tirelessly to make our vision become a reality. We have some significant targets. Coupled with experts on blockchain to help us achieve our goals and roadmap. We have the team, the energy and the ambition to make it happen.With a clear path ahead and with the support of investors, there is no stopping how far we can all go together.Xrp Classic's uniqueness, will be highlighted by its appeal to many across the world, both in and out of the crypto space.Thank you for being a part of the Xrp Classic Community! Tokenomics:9%Buy Tax3% for marketing1% for liquidity5% for $XRP reflections9% Sell Tax3% for marketing1% for liquidity5% for $XRP reflectionsContract: 0x30c54D82564aeE6a56755F80AA4bbdF2e5093322  Twitter: https://twitter.com/XrpClassicWebsite: https://www.xrpclassic.com/Whitepaper: https://docs.xrpclassic.com/Coinsbit: https://coinsbit.io/en/trade/XRPC_USDT
